Detailed Description

An ecapsulation of a single frame of the signal.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Aquila::Frame::Frame ( const std::vector< int > &  source,
unsigned int  indexBegin,
unsigned int  indexEnd 
)

Creates the frame object - sets signal source and frame boundaries.

Frame should not change original data, so the source is a const reference.

Parameters:
source const reference to signal source
indexBegin position of first sample of this frame in the source
indexEnd position of last sample of this frame in the source
